data.Title: OpenAI Seeks Billions in Funding at $100B+ Valuation
data.Description: OpenAI, the company behind ChatGPT, is reportedly in talks to raise billions of dollars in funding, potentially valuing the company at over $100 billion, signaling the growing investment in artificial intelligence.

data.Title: OpenAI says ChatGPT weekly active users doubled since last year to 200M+, 92% of Fortune 500 companies use its tools, and automated API usage doubled since July axios.com/2024/08/29/ope\u2026
data.Description: 200M+ -> OpenAI says ChatGPT weekly active users doubled since last year to 200M+, 92% of Fortune 500 companies use its tools, and automated API usage doubled since July axios.com/2024/08/29/ope\u2026

data.Title: Yelp Sues Google Over Alleged Antitrust Violations in Local Search
data.Description: Yelp has filed a lawsuit against Google, alleging that the search giant leverages its dominance in general search to gain an unfair advantage in local search services and advertising.

data.Title: Google Unifies Booking Across Google Business Profiles and Local Service Ads
data.Description: Google is streamlining its booking system by unifying it across Google Business Profiles (GBP) and Local Service Ads (LSAs), potentially simplifying the booking process for both businesses and customers.

data.Title: Google's John Mu: Link and Word Count Not Ranking Factors
data.Description: Google's John Mu clarifies that Google does not consider the number of links or words in a blog post as ranking factors, emphasizing the importance of quality content over quantity.

data.Title: Google Debunks Outbound Links For SEO
data.Description: Google's John Mueller put a fork in a popular tactic that recommends linking out to other sites as good for SEO

data.Title: Google Updates Tag Diagnostics and Consent Management
data.Description: Google introduces updates to its Tag Diagnostics and consent management setup within Google Ads, Google Analytics, and Tag Manager, potentially impacting how websites manage user consent and data tracking.

data.Title: Apple's Applebot-Extended AI Crawler Blocked by Major Websites
data.Description: Multiple high-profile websites, including Facebook, Instagram, Craigslist, and The New York Times, have blocked Apple's Applebot-Extended AI crawler, potentially impacting Apple's ability to gather data for its AI initiatives.

data.Title: Google Search Introduces "From Your Notifications" Box
data.Description: Google Search is testing a new feature that displays a "from your notifications" box within search results, potentially providing users with more personalized and contextually relevant information.

data.Title: Cameo Surges in SERPs Following August Google Core Update
data.Description: Cameo, a platform for personalized celebrity video messages, has seen a significant increase in search engine rankings following the August Google core update, according to SEO expert Glenn Gabe.

data.Title: Google's June Spam Update Shows Delayed Impact
data.Description: Glenn Gabe observes a website experiencing a significant drop in rankings at the tail end of the June spam update, highlighting the potential for delayed effects from Google's algorithm updates.
